Key Match Events: Oneil Cruz suffered an ankle injury and was taken out of the game
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Derek Shelton stated that the injury was precautionary and there doesn't appear to be much concern regarding Cruz's long-term availability
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cruz has had a tough time adjusting to center field since transitioning there in late August
Others: Cruz has hit.268/.326/.459 with 19 home runs, 74 RBIs and 22 stolen bases through 135 games this year
